body: I wanted to fap to this at first, but it wouldn't feel right today. Today KyoAni Studio 1 got burned down by a crazy maniac who killed more than 30 of the KyoAni staff. I pray for them and won't fap to K-ON stuff today, although I do this 2-3 times a day, most especially to Mio X Ugly Bastard / Gangbang Doujins.
